data.title: John Wayne
data.text:
[1] UCLA Medical Center, Los Angeles, CA.

Wife: Josephine Alicia Saenz (m. 24-Jun-1933, div. 25-Dec-1945, two sons, two daughters)

Son: Michael Wayne (film producer, b. 23-Nov-1934, d. 2-Apr-2003)

Son: Patrick Wayne (actor, b. 15-Jul-1939)

Daughter: Toni Wayne (b. 25-Feb-1936, d. 6-Dec-2000)

Daughter: Melinda Wayne (b. 3-Dec-1940)

Wife: Esperanza Baur (m. 17-Jan-1946, div. 1-Nov-1954)

Wife: Pilar Wayne (m. 1-Nov-1954, until his death, two daughters, one son)

Daughter: Aissa Wayne (b. 31-Mar-1956)

Son: John Ethan Wayne (actor, b. 22-Feb-1962)

Daughter: Marisa Wayne

High School: Glendale Union High School, Glendale, CA

University: University of Southern California (1925-7)

Christian Anti-Communist Crusade

Ducks Unlimited

Motion Picture Alliance for the Preservation of American Ideals President (1948-52)

Sigma Chi Fraternity

Shriners

Order of DeMolay Legion of Honor, 1970

Oscar for Best Actor 1970 for True Grit

Golden Globe 1970 for True Grit

Congressional Gold Medal

National Cowboy Hall of Fame

Grand Marshal of the Tournament of Roses 1973

Hollywood Walk of Fame 1541 Vine St.

Draft Deferment: World War II 3A

Draft Deferment: World War II 2A (1944)

Converted to Catholicism Roman

Lung Removal (Sep-1964)

Open Heart Surgery 1978

Cholecystectomy

Endorsement of Anheuser-Busch Budweiser

Endorsement of Coors posthumous commercial appearance (1996)

Endorsement of R. J. Reynolds Camel cigarettes

Visited Disneyland Candlelight Procession (Dec-1971)

Risk Factors: Smoking, Lung Cancer
